script.title: Dataset
script.description: Create and permission a dataset in BigQuery.
instructions: Specify the name of the dataset.
If dataset exists, it is inchanged.
Add emails and / or groups to add read permission.
CAUTION: Removing permissions in StarThinker has no effect.
CAUTION: To remove permissions you have to edit the dataset.

field.name: dataset_dataset
field.description: Name of Google BigQuery dataset to create.
